predicate.note: Frames file for 'deal' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'handle.'

roleset.name: handle, deal with

example.name: deal with
example.text: By contrast, Value Line said Georgia-Pacific-1 ``is in a comparatively good position *trace*-1 to deal with weakening paper markets,'' ...

example.name: deal in
example.text: The idea was to let small investors, the backbone of the fund business, deal in the money market's high short-term interest rates.
example.arg: small investors, the backbone of the fund business,
in the money market's high short-term interest rates

roleset.note: Probably two distinct senses, but syntactically similar enough to be merged.

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: But the computer-guided selling in response to those developments dealt a serious blow to the over-the-counter market, Mr. DaPuzzo said.
example.arg: the computer-guided selling in response to those developments
